name: Material Request DFM
query:
SELECT
mr.name as "ID:Link/Material Request:150",
mr.schedule_date as "Required Date:Date:100",
mr.material_request_type as "Type:Data:100",
mr.company as "Company:Link/Company:120",
mri.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:100",
mri.item_name as "Item Name:Data:150",
mri.qty as "Quantity:Float:80",
mri.uom as "UOM:Data:50",
mri.schedule_date as "Item Required Date:Date:100",
mri.warehouse as "For Warehouse:Data:180"
FROM
`tabMaterial Request` mr, `tabMaterial Request Item` mri
WHERE
mri.parent = mr.name and mr.schedule_date>=%(from_date)s and mr.schedule_date<=%(to_date)s
order by mr.schedule_date desc;
